definition: to bloom/to blossom/to flower/fig. to burst open/to feel happy or elated/new development grows out

to open/to start/to turn on/to boil/to write out (a prescription, check, invoice etc)/to operate (a vehicle)/carat (gold)/abbr. for Kelvin, 開爾文|开尔文[Kai1 er3 wen2]/abbr. for 開本|开本[kai1 ben3], book format
flower/blossom/CL:朵[duo3],支[zhi1],束[shu4],把[ba3],盆[pen2],簇[cu4]/fancy pattern/florid/to spend (money, time)/(coll.) lecherous/lustful
to blossom everywhere/to spring up all over the place/to flourish on a large scale
lit. the iron tree blooms (idiom)/a highly improbable or extremely rare occurrence
to deck the tree with false blossoms/to make something of no value appear valuable (idiom)
erhua variant of 開花|开花[kai1 hua1]
to open a bale of cotton

sentences.english: Different irrigation maximums also influenced plant significantly at blooming and fruit-bearing stage.
sentences.chinese: 不同灌水上限对开花结果期也有显著影响。

sentences.english: The clockface of twelve o'clock, when time blooms.
sentences.chinese: 十二点的钟面，时间开花。

sentences.english: Girdling and other treatments can induce polypoid plants to flower earlier.
sentences.chinese: 用环剥树皮等方法可以诱导多倍体无性系提早开花。

sentences.english: The chilling sensitivity of stamen, pistil and fertilization of pepper at different stages was studied.
sentences.chinese: 现蕾期和开花期的花器官对低温的敏感性不同。

sentences.english: Can the happy tree bloom , bear fruit?
sentences.chinese: 幸福树会不会开花，结果？

sentences.english: Some flowers have begun to come out.
sentences.chinese: 有些花现在已经开始开花了。

sentences.english: The cherry-trees will blossom next month.
The pear trees are blossoming out early this year.
sentences.chinese: 今年梨树很早就在开花了。

sentences.english: A preliminary study on change patterns of ethylene production during flower opening and senescence in cut roses (Chinese with English Abstract).
sentences.chinese: 月季切花开花和衰老进程中乙烯变化类型初探。

sentences.english: Some plants have flowers but do not seed .
sentences.chinese: 有些植物开花而不结籽。

sentences.english: These sectors are already blossoming, albeit with a focus on domestic industry.
sentences.chinese: 这些行业多点开花，虽然重心仍在中国国内。

sentences.english: CO(constans) was an important gene involved in the photoperiod pathway controlling plant flowering time.
sentences.chinese: 是植物开花时间光周期调控途径中的一个重要基因。

sentences.english: When their linseed is ripe for harvest the hemp is in bloom in our field.
sentences.chinese: 他们的亚麻籽成熟收获时，我们田间的大麻正在开花。

sentences.english: For example, plants could bloom earlier than their pollinating insects become active.
sentences.chinese: 例如，植物可以开花早于他们的传粉昆虫活跃。

sentences.english: This plant flowers with a distinct yellow limb of the spathe.
sentences.chinese: 这些椒开花时佛焰苞的冠檐是鲜明的黄色。

sentences.english: Most fruit trees flower in the spring.
sentences.chinese: 大多数的果树在春天里开花。
